text: “Ha ha ha ha ha ha Halloween is here!”

The bonfires burning 
Crackle crack crack

Shadow’s dancing 
Lick lack lack

The pumpkins smiling 
Behind your back

Midnight’s coming 
Tik tok tak
It’s Halloween night It’s Halloween night

Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
Halloween night
It’s Halloween night It’s Halloween night

Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
Halloween night
“Look out!
The ghosts and ghouls are everywhere!”

The zombies prowling
Prowl prowl prowl

Werewolves howling
Howl howl howl

The witch is scowling 
Scowl scowl scowl

Monsters growling
Growl growl growl
It’s Halloween night It’s Halloween night

Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
Halloween night
It’s Halloween night It’s Halloween night

Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
Halloween night
“Let’s find ourselves a nice safe place to hide!”

The bonfires burning 
Crackle crack crack

Shadow’s dancing 
Lick lack lack

The pumpkins smiling 
Behind your back

Midnight’s coming 
Tik tok tak
It’s Halloween night It’s Halloween night

Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
Halloween night
It’s Halloween night It’s Halloween night

Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha
Halloween night
“It’s time to get back home.
See you next Halloween.
Goodbye!"
